snippet: Alex Dowsett won the individual time trial in the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia after the favorite Bradley Wiggins was slowed by a tire puncture.
abstract: Alex Dowsett wins individual time trial in eighth stage of Giro d’Italia after favorite Bradley Wiggins is slowed by a tire puncture; Vincenzo Nibali, Wiggins’s main rival for the title, takes the overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Alex Dowsett won the individual time trial in the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia after the favorite Bradley Wiggins was slowed by a tire puncture.

headline.print_headline: Tire Puncture Sets Back Favorite in Italy
